support-page.title: How Can We Help?
support-page.description: Get answers to your questions and solutions to your problems.

questions.q: How do I create a GPlay account?
questions.a: Download any of our games and follow the sign-up instructions. You can use your email, phone number, or connect your social media account. Your GPlay account works across all our games.

questions.q: I forgot my password. How can I reset it?
questions.a: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login screen. Enter your email or phone number and we’ll send you a reset link. Follow the instructions to create a new password.

questions.q: Can I play on multiple devices?
questions.a: Yes! Your GPlay account syncs across all devices. Simply log in with the same account to continue your progress.

questions.q: How can I report a bug?
questions.a: Use the in-game support button or contact us through the form below. Please include your device model, game version, and a description of the issue. Screenshots are very helpful!
Our games are free to play with optional in-app purchases. You can enjoy all core features without spending money. Purchases are usually for cosmetic items or faster progression.
Open the Friends menu in-game, search for their username, or link your social media accounts. You can also use invite codes to add friends directly.

questions.q: The game won’t load. What should I do?
questions.a: Try the following: 1) Check your internet connection, 2) Restart the app, 3) Clear game cache, 4) Update to the latest version, 5) Restart your device. If the problem persists, contact support.
Lag can be caused by slow internet, low memory, or too many apps running. Close background apps, ensure a stable connection, and try lowering graphics settings.

questions.q: How do I update the game?
questions.a: Go to your app store (App Store or Google Play), find the game, and tap 'Update'. Enable auto-updates to always stay current.

questions.q: I made a purchase but didn’t receive my items.
questions.a: Restart the game first to check. If the items are still missing, contact support and include your purchase receipt. Most issues are resolved within 24 hours.
Refund policies depend on your app store (Apple or Google). Usually, refunds can be requested within a certain timeframe. Check your app store’s refund policy or contact their support.

questions.q: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.a: We accept all payment methods supported by your app store, including credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, and app store gift cards.
